    • Method Detail

      • getIsInterfacePredicate

        public static Predicate<Class<?>> getIsInterfacePredicate()
        Adapts the Class.isInterface() method to an Predicate. This Predicate that evaluates to true if the object it is evaluated against is a Class and the class is an interface.
        Returns:
        a Predicate that evaluates to true if the object it is evaluated against is a Class and that Class represents an interface.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getMemberNamePredicate

        public static Predicate<Member> getMemberNamePredicate(String memberName)
        A Predicate that evaluates to true if it is evaluated against Member objects and the Member.getName() is equal to the memberName this Predicate was constructed with.
        Returns:
        Predicate that evaluates to true if the Member's name it is evaluated against is equal to the name that this member name predicate was constructed with.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getDeclaringClassPredicate

        public static Predicate<Member> getDeclaringClassPredicate(Class<?> declaringClass)
        A Predicate that evaluates to true if the object it is evaluated against is a Member and that Member's declaring class is equal to the Class that this declaring class member predicate was constructed with.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getIsAssignablePredicate

        public static Predicate<Object> getIsAssignablePredicate(Class<?> clazz)
        A Predicate that evaluates to true if the Class that this AssignablePredicate was constructed with is assignable from the class that it is evaluated against.
        Returns:
        a Predicate that evaluates to true if the Class it is evaluated against is assignable from the class it was constructed with.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getMemberNamePatternPredicate

        public static Predicate<Member> getMemberNamePatternPredicate(Pattern namePattern)
        Predicate that evaluates to true if the Member's name it is evaluated against matches a given Pattern.
        Returns:
        a Predicate that evaluates to true if it is evaluated against a Member object and the Member's name matches the namePattern.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getSerializableReference

        public static SerializableReference<? extends Member> getSerializableReference(Member member)
        A factory method for SerializableReference objects that hold Members.
        Parameters:
        member -
        Returns:
        a SerializableReference that represents the member. This factory method can produce SerializableReferences for Constructors, Methods and Fields.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getSerializableReference

        public static SerializableReference<Constructor<?>> getSerializableReference(Constructor<?> constructor)
        A factory method for SerializableReference object that hold Constructors.
        Parameters:
        constructor -
        Returns:
        a SerializableReference that represents the Constructor and ensures that the constructor is available each time the Reference.get() method is called. Even after serialisation/deserialization of the SerializableReference.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getSerializableReference

        public static SerializableReference<Method> getSerializableReference(Method method)
        A factory method for SerializableReference object that hold Methods.
        Parameters:
        method -
        Returns:
        a SerializableReference that represents the Method and ensures that the method is available each time the Reference.get() method is called. Even after serialisation/deserialization of the SerializableReference.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getSerializableReference

        public static SerializableReference<Field> getSerializableReference(Field field)
        A factory method for SerializableReference object that hold Fields.
        Parameters:
        field -
        Returns:
        a SerializableReference that represents the Field and ensures that the field is available each time the Reference.get() method is called. Even after serialisation/deserialization of the SerializableReference.
        Since:
        1.0.0;

      • getSerializableReference

        public static SerializableReference<Package> getSerializableReference(Package packageObj)
        A factory method for SerializableReference object that hold Packages.
        Parameters:
        packageObj -
        Returns:
        a SerializableReference that represents the Package and ensures that the package is available each time the Reference.get() method is called. Even after serialisation/deserialization of the SerializableReference.
        Since:
        1.0.0;
